<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Graceful Guidance](/Feats.aspx?ID=5551) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Catfolk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=746" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 10 <sup>1.1</sup>

</column>

---

You can demonstrate how to quickly twist out of the way of dangerous effects. You can use the [Aid](/Actions.aspx?ID=2292) reaction to grant a bonus to an ally's Reflex save. As usual for Aid, you need to prepare by using an action on your turn to encourage the ally.
name: Graceful Guidance
